extendedInfo.description: Volleyball Challenge (Trivia Quiz) - This trivia quiz game challenges you with both easy and tough questions in 6 categories and more than 150 questions.Share your Trivia Quiz results with friends and coaches via Text or email.  Compare your scores and see how their Volleyball IQ compares to yours.Have fun and increase your Volleyball IQ with the Volleyball Challenge Trivia Quiz game. Compliments of Club Volleyball Gear.

reviews.title: Questionable questions..
reviews.comment: Some questions are good however others are either worded poorly or wrong. \"A skyball is a beach serve that goes unusually high and lands out of bounds\"....... fine if question ended after \"high\" but adding the \"lands out of bounds\" makes it a false statement as the label of the serve is a skyball regardless of where it lands. Also, \"the most effective serve in volleyball\" and the answer is jump float. Then why are almost all of the aces in the Olympics at the moment jump top spins..?? Few others similar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome!!!
reviews.comment: I\'m a vball player myself andd this app is sooooo good!!! Good questions some even stumped me!!! Love it way better than al the other vball apps!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simply awesome! They developed a nice app with cool UI.
